channel.title: Beta on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Beta on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop 9.1 Beta is open for feedback!
item.description: PrestaShop 9.1 Beta is here, and it includes several major improvements that you can already start exploring and sharing feedback on. Your input is valuable for the final release of PrestaShop 9.1.

item.title: PrestaShop 9.1 is in feature freeze
item.description: As of December 12th, 2025, PrestaShop version 9.1 has entered the feature freeze phase. Learn more about the feature freeze, the next steps, and what’s coming in PrestaShop 9.1.

item.title: Adapting to PrestaShop 9: Guzzle is gone, what's next?
item.description: PrestaShop 9 is a major release, meaning it introduces breaking changes, including the removal of certain dependencies. One of the most impactful changes for module developers is the removal of Guzzle, a popular HTTP client that many modules relied on.

item.title: Reworking the "Update Assistant" Module V7: Our Experience
item.description: Let’s face it—our Update Assistant module was messy. The front-end was confusing, the user experience was challenging, and even minor adjustments were a little more complex than what we would have liked.

item.title: PrestaShop 9.0 beta is now available!
item.description: The first beta version of PrestaShop 9.0 is now available for testing. This version includes many new features and improvements, a new Hummingbird theme, a new Admin API, PHP 8.4 and Symfony 6.4 support, many bug fixes, and a significant codebase cleanup. Read on to learn more about the new features and improvements.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1 beta is open for feedback!
item.description: The beta version of PrestaShop 8.1 is now ready for you to test!

item.title: PrestaShop 8.0 beta is open for feedback!
item.description: The public beta version of PrestaShop 8.0 is now ready for you to test!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.7.0 Beta Is Ready To Be Tested!
item.description: The first Beta version for PrestaShop 1.7.7.0 is now ready for you to test!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7 minor release lifecycle
item.description: The journey of the release of PrestaShop 1.7.7.0 has started. This moment is a nice opportunity to explain PrestaShop’s minor release lifecycle.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.6.0 beta is open for feedback!
item.description: The first Beta version for PrestaShop 1.7.6.0 is now ready for you to test!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.5.0 release candidate is open for feedback!
item.description: A few weeks after the beta, the first release candidate for PrestaShop 1.7.5.0 is now ready for you to test!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.5.0 beta is open for feedback!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.4.0 beta 1 is open for feedback!
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.4 is available for download. Please read important informations about it.
